snippet: Netflix is offering its video streaming service in Britain and Ireland. After a one-month free trial period, the service will cost 5.99 in Britain ($9.25) or 6.99 euros in Ireland ($8.92).
abstract: Netflix is offering its video streaming service in Britain and Ireland. After a one-month free trial period, the service will cost 5.99 in Britain ($9.25) or 6.99 euros in Ireland ($8.92).

headline.main: Netflix Hops the Pond and Offers Video Streaming in Britain
